actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to express congressional support of the United Nations sponsored World Food Conference and World Population Conference taking place this year.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United States should: (1) act to relieve immediate threats of famine where it exists and assist food-short nations in increasing food production; (2) attempt to achieve an international agreement on a food reserve to be used in emergencies; (3) assist in social and economic growth and in population control (as requested) in underdeveloped nations; and (4) support the efficient use and equitable distribution of food worldwide.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to express congressional support of the United Nations sponsored World Food Conference and World Population Conference taking place this year.
